sentences.sContent: She found him an exalted sinecure as a Fellow of the Library of Congress.
sentences.sCn: 她给他找了一个级别很高的闲职：国会图书馆研究员。

remMethod.val: secure (无虑的) 中间加个in → 处于无忧无虑的状态 → 闲职

trans.tranCn: 工作清闲而报酬丰厚的职位， 挂名职务， 闲职
trans.tranOther: a job which you get paid for even though you do not have to do very much work
